hymn.title: Mathew, Mark and Luke and John

layout.singingstanza: Mat -- thew, Mark and Luke and John, Acts and Ro -- mans, First Cor -- in -- thi -- ans, Sec -- ond Cor -- in -- thi -- ans, Ga -- la -- tians, Eph -- e -- sians, Phil -- ip -- pi -- ans, Col -- os -- sians, First and Sec -- ond Thes -- sa -- lo -- ni -- ans, First and Sec -- ond Tim -- o -- thy, Ti -- tus, Phi -- le -- mon, He -- brews, James, First and Sec -- ond Pe -- ter, First and Sec -- ond, Third John, Jude and Rev -- e -- la -- tion.
layout.sheetcopyright: www.hymnal.net; © 2007 Bible StorySongs, Inc. Used by permission.

lyrics.stanza: Mathew, Mark and Luke and John, Acts and Romans, First Corinthians, Second Corinthians, Galatians, Ephesians, Philippians, Colossians, First and Second Thessalonians, First and Second Timothy, Titus, Philemon, Hebrews, James, First and Second Peter, First and Second, Third John, Jude and Revelation.
